name: Perplexity AI
description: Perplexity AI is an AI-powered search engine that provides accurate, conversational answers to user queries.
longDescription: Perplexity AI is an innovative search engine that leverages advanced artificial intelligence to deliver precise, context-aware answers in a conversational format. Unlike traditional search engines, it focuses on understanding user intent to provide direct responses rather than just links, making it ideal for quick, reliable information retrieval. Founded with a mission to accelerate human discovery, Perplexity AI aims to simplify access to knowledge by synthesizing information from diverse sources. It serves users ranging from students and researchers to professionals seeking fast, trustworthy answers to complex questions. The platform combines natural language processing with real-time web access to ensure up-to-date responses, often citing sources for transparency.
features: Conversational AI delivers direct, human-like answers to queries, enhancing user understanding.
Real-time web access ensures responses include the latest available information.
Source citation provides transparency by linking answers to credible references.
Multimodal search supports text and image-based queries for versatile use cases.
Customizable AI profiles allow users to tailor response styles to their preferences.
Pro Search feature enables deeper, iterative exploration of complex topics.
Mobile app availability offers seamless access to answers on iOS and Android devices.
Answer summarization condenses complex information into concise, digestible responses.

faqs.question: What is Perplexity AI used for?
faqs.answer: Perplexity AI is used for answering questions conversationally, providing accurate and sourced responses for research, education, or general knowledge.

faqs.question: Is Perplexity AI free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Perplexity AI offers a free plan with access to core features, though a premium plan unlocks higher usage limits and advanced capabilities.

faqs.question: How does Perplexity AI differ from Google?
faqs.answer: Unlike Google, Perplexity AI focuses on direct, conversational answers with source citations rather than listing search results, prioritizing clarity and context.

faqs.question: Can Perplexity AI handle complex research questions?
faqs.answer: Yes, its Pro Search feature allows iterative exploration of topics, breaking down complex queries into manageable, detailed responses.

faqs.question: Does Perplexity AI support image-based queries?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can upload images to ask related questions, enabling multimodal search capabilities.

faqs.question: Is Perplexity AI available on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Perplexity AI has dedicated apps for iOS and Android, offering full functionality on the go.

faqs.question: How accurate are Perplexity AIâ€™s answers?
faqs.answer: Perplexity AI strives for accuracy by pulling from reliable sources and citing them, though users should verify critical information.
